name: portworx-couchdb
description: Apache CouchDB backed by Portworx volumes
preInstallNotes:
Default configuration requires 3 agent nodes each with: 0.5 CPU | 2048 MB MEM

Portworx should be installed on the Private Agents to be able to provision volumes.

Community packages are unverified and unreviewed content from the community.
postInstallNotes:
DC/OS portworx-couchdb is being installed!

	Documentation: https://docs.portworx.com/scheduler/mesosphere-dcos/frameworks.html
postUninstallNotes:
DC/OS portworx-couchdb has been uninstalled.
Please follow the instructions at https://docs.portworx.com/scheduler/mesosphere-dcos/framework_cleanup.html to remove any persistent state if required.
